deadmines.name: Deadmines

bosses.name: Rhahk'Zor
bosses.strategy: Simple first boss. Tank and spank.

bosses.name: Sneed
bosses.strategy: Kill the Shredder first, then Sneed will come out.

bosses.name: Gilnid
bosses.strategy: Kill the adds first, then focus on the boss.

bosses.name: Mr. Smite
bosses.strategy: He stuns at health thresholds and switches weapons. Save cooldowns for after stuns.

bosses.name: Captain Greenskin
bosses.strategy: Tank adds away from the group, focus down the boss.

bosses.name: Edwin VanCleef
bosses.strategy: He summons adds at low health. Save cooldowns for this phase.

tips: Watch for patrols in the foundry area.
Be careful of the goblin engineers, they can call for help.
The shortcut through the side tunnel can save time.
After Mr. Smite, you can jump down to skip trash.

wailing_caverns.name: Wailing Caverns

bosses.name: Lady Anacondra
bosses.strategy: Interrupt her Sleep spell. Tank and spank otherwise.

bosses.name: Lord Cobrahn
bosses.strategy: He will transform into a snake at low health. Increased damage, so save defensives.

bosses.name: Kresh
bosses.strategy: Optional boss. Simple tank and spank fight in the water.

bosses.name: Lord Pythas
bosses.strategy: Interrupt his healing spell. Otherwise tank and spank.

bosses.name: Skum
bosses.strategy: Optional boss. Fights in water. Can charge, so stay close.

bosses.name: Lord Serpentis
bosses.strategy: Focuses random targets. Healers be aware.

bosses.name: Verdan the Everliving
bosses.strategy: Final boss. Can knock players back and stun. Tank against a wall.

tips: The dungeon is a maze. Follow the marked path or you'll get lost.
There are four Fanglord bosses that must be killed before awakening Naralex.
Deviate Faerie Dragons can put everyone to sleep. Kill them quickly.
After all bosses, talk to the Disciple to start the final event.
